meanings.definition: The flesh of a horse used as food.
meanings.sent1: Some people in certain countries eat horsemeat.
meanings.sent2: The butcher sold horsemeat to the adventurous foodies.
meanings.sent3: At the exotic restaurant, they served horsemeat burgers.
meanings.sent4: The thought of consuming horsemeat made her shudder.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of cooking horsemeat filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: The farmer raised horses for their horsemeat.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store imported horsemeat from overseas.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added horsemeat to the beef stew.
meanings.sent4: She was surprised by the tenderness of the horsemeat steak.
meanings.sent5: The horsemeat sandwich was a unique delicacy at the fair.
